Package remodel.meta

Class Metamodel

java.lang.Object
remodel.meta.Nominal
remodel.meta.Namespace<Concept>
remodel.meta.Metamodel
public class Metamodel
extends Namespace<Concept>
Metamodel encapsulates a ReMoDeL metamodel. A Metamodel consists of a set of named Concepts, each of which in turn consists of a set of named Properties. Each Concept is named uniquely within this Metamodel (duplicate Concepts replace earlier versions).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons

  • Constructor Details

    • Metamodel

      public Metamodel​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a Metamodel with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Metamodel.

  • Method Details

    • addConcept

      public void addConcept​(Concept concept)
      Adds a Concept to this Metamodel
      Parameters:
      concept - the Concept to add.

    • getConcepts

      public java.util.List<Concept> getConcepts()
      Returns a list of this Metamodel's Concepts. Returns all user-defined Concepts in this Metamodel, but ignores predefined Concepts.
      Returns:
      a list of Concepts.

    • getConcept

      public Concept getConcept​(java.lang.String type)
      Returns a given Concept selected by its type name. If the type does not refer to a known Concept, checks first whether this is a list or set type whose elements belong in this Metamodel and, if so, adds this as a built-in Concept and returns it. The basic types belong to every Metamodel.
      Parameters:
      type - the name of the Concept.
      Returns:
      the Concept, or null.
